name: Franky the Bumwalker
description: Franky the Bumwalker is an adventure game featuring quirky hero travelling in unique and fun world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: with 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space
